Sentencas: Various current collection methods were investigated during performance tests of anode supported solid oxide fuel cells under constant current and thermal cycling conditions.
Titulo: Investigating the effect of current collecting conditions on solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) performance with additional voltage probes

Sentencas: Additional voltage losses originating in the current collector mesh were distinguished using Pt voltage probes attached to the electrode surfaces.
Titulo: Investigating the effect of current collecting conditions on solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) performance with additional voltage probes

Sentencas: Contact resistance was substantial when a Crofer mesh was used without Pt contact paste, depending on the diameter of the Crofer mesh wire, while it was negligible for silver mesh with Pt contact paste.
Titulo: Investigating the effect of current collecting conditions on solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) performance with additional voltage probes

Sentencas: It was also observed that contact resistance decreased with growing contact area, and non-ohmic polarization resistance increased due to Cr poisoning, with constant current test time.
Titulo: Investigating the effect of current collecting conditions on solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) performance with additional voltage probes

Sentencas: Thermal cycling tests were conducted on cells containing Ni-Co coated Crofer meshes with and without Pt contact paste.
Titulo: Investigating the effect of current collecting conditions on solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) performance with additional voltage probes

Sentencas: The cell performance without Pt contact paste was unstable, especially during deep and slow cycling.
Titulo: Investigating the effect of current collecting conditions on solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) performance with additional voltage probes

Sentencas: This was attributed to increasing contact resistance between the cell and the mesh.
Titulo: Investigating the effect of current collecting conditions on solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) performance with additional voltage probes

Sentencas: In contrast, the cell with Pt contact paste operated stably throughout the thermal cycles, maintaining the level of contact resistance as well as the performance of the cell itself.
Titulo: Investigating the effect of current collecting conditions on solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) performance with additional voltage probes

Sentencas: The present work determined that the type of current collecting method can substantially affect cell stability during long-term constant current mode and thermal cycling, and contact resistance can be measured in-situ using additional voltage probes.
Titulo: Investigating the effect of current collecting conditions on solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) performance with additional voltage probes
